import React from "react"; import styles from "./profile.module.css"; const AssessmentProfile = ({candidateName = 'candidate'}) => { return (

Welcome, {candidateName}!

Please share your basic details to start the assessment. The timer will start only once you click the “Save & start assessment” button.

Save & Start Assessment
  • Home
  • CV vs Live coding
  • How it works
  • Take Practice Session
Log InSign up
2021 © Shuffle
); } export default AssessmentProfile;
